register.name: SC1%s
register.description: ADC Status and Control Registers 1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11010
enumeratedValue.description: Temp sensor (single-ended) is selected as input

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11101
enumeratedValue.description: VREFSH is selected as input. Voltage reference selected is determined by the REFSEL bits in the SC2 register

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11110
enumeratedValue.description: VREFSL is selected as input. Voltage reference selected is determined by the REFSEL bits in the SC2 register

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Single-ended conversions and input channels are selected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Differential conversions and input channels are selected

register.name: CFG1
register.description: ADC Configuration Register 1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: The divide ratio is 1 and the clock rate is input clock

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: The divide ratio is 2 and the clock rate is (input clock)/2

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: The divide ratio is 4 and the clock rate is (input clock)/4

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: The divide ratio is 8 and the clock rate is (input clock)/8

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Low-power configuration. The power is reduced at the expense of maximum clock speed

register.name: CFG2
register.description: ADC Configuration Register 2

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: Default longest sample time; 20 extra ADCK cycles; 24 ADCK cycles total

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: 12 extra ADCK cycles; 16 ADCK cycles total sample time

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: 6 extra ADCK cycles; 10 ADCK cycles total sample time

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: 2 extra ADCK cycles; 6 ADCK cycles total sample time

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: High-speed conversion sequence selected with 2 additional ADCK cycles to total conversion time

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Asynchronous clock output disabled; Asynchronous clock is enabled only if selected by ADICLK and a conversion is active

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Asynchronous clock and clock output is enabled regardless of the state of the ADC

register.name: R%s
register.description: ADC Data Result Register

register.name: CV%s
register.description: Compare Value

register.name: SC2
register.description: Status and Control Register 2

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: Default voltage reference pin pair, that is, external pins VREFH and VREFL

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: Alternate reference pair, that is, VALTH and VALTL . This pair may be additional external pins or internal sources depending on the MCU configuration. See the chip configuration information for details specific to this MCU

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: DMA is enabled and will assert the ADC DMA request during an ADC conversion complete event noted when any of the SC1n[COCO] flags is asserted

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Range function disabled. Only CV1 is compared

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Range function enabled. Both CV1 and CV2 are compared

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Configures less than threshold, outside range not inclusive and inside range not inclusive; functionality based on the values placed in CV1 and CV2

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Configures greater than or equal to threshold, outside and inside ranges inclusive; functionality based on the values placed in CV1 and CV2

register.name: SC3
register.description: Status and Control Register 3

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: One conversion or one set of conversions if the hardware average function is enabled (AVGE=1) after initiating a conversion

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Continuous conversions or sets of conversions if the hardware average function is enabled (AVGE=1) after initiating a conversion

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Calibration failed. ADC accuracy specifications are not guaranteed

register.name: OFS
register.description: ADC Offset Correction Register

register.name: PG
register.description: ADC Plus-Side Gain Register

register.name: MG
register.description: ADC Minus-Side Gain Register

register.name: CLPD
register.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

register.name: CLPS
register.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

register.name: CLP4
register.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

register.name: CLP3
register.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

register.name: CLP2
register.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

register.name: CLP1
register.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

register.name: CLP0
register.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

register.name: PGA
register.description: ADC PGA Register

register.name: CLMD
register.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

register.name: CLMS
register.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

register.name: CLM4
register.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

register.name: CLM3
register.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

register.name: CLM2
register.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

register.name: CLM1
register.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

register.name: CLM0
register.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register
